data.comment: Luton kick-off the first half - the match is underway!
Luton's Rhys Norrington-Davies has been booked in Luton.
In the minute 35, Luke Berry scores to make it 1-0 at Kenilworth Road.
The second half is underway in Luton - Derby County with the kick-off.
In the minute 46, The home team replace Glen Rea with James Bree.
Louie Sibley is on a sub for Graeme Shinnie for Derby County.
Jack Marriott is on target to level the scores at 1-1.
In the minute 64, Derby County make their second substitution with Jahmal Hector-Ingram replacing Jack Marriott.
George Moncur is replacing Harry Cornick for Luton at Kenilworth Road.
Jordan Clark is replacing Elliott Lee for the home team.
In the minute 87, Jordan Clark puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 2-1.
Phillip Cocu is making the team's third substitution at Kenilworth Road with Morgan Whittaker replacing Kamil Jozwiak.
The second-half is over. The match ends 2-1.
Ruddock Pelly for Luton has been booked by Dean Whitestone and receives a first yellow card.
